appetizers.name: Code Bytes
appetizers.description: A classic bruschetta with an updated name that will leave you wanting more!

appetizers.name: Debugging Dip
appetizers.description: A creamy and savory dip to debug your hunger with.

cold sandwiches.name: The Syntax Error
cold sandwiches.description: A classic roast beef sandwich with an added layer of Swiss cheese that will fix any syntax errors in your code.

cold sandwiches.name: The GitHub
cold sandwiches.description: A sandwich with all the best ingredients that will help you push your code to the next level.

hot sandwiches.name: The API
hot sandwiches.description: A hot and juicy chicken sandwich with barbecue sauce that will have you saying 'APIs have never tasted so good.'

hot sandwiches.name: The Stack Overflow
hot sandwiches.description: A classic meatball sub that will leave you feeling like you just found the answer to all your coding problems.

desserts.name: Byte-sized Brownies
desserts.description: Small but mighty brownies that will make you feel like you're indulging in a little bit of code sweetness.

desserts.name: Error-free Cheesecake
desserts.description: A creamy and error-free cheesecake that will leave you wanting more and more.

drinks.name: Java Jolt
drinks.description: A classic coffee drink that will give you the jolt you need to code through the night.

drinks.name: Soda Stream
drinks.description: A customizable soda drink that will help you quench your thirst while coding.
